description3English: Yogis Helping Yogis: The Art of Adjustment Learn hands-on adjustment techniques to safely and effectively assist fellow practitioners. This workshop covers: * How to approach and connect with another‚Äôs practice * When adjustments are beneficial and when to hold back * Where to position yourself for optimal support * Why proper adjustments matter for safety and progress Valuable for both teachers refining their skills and students seeking to understand how they can best be supported in the Mysore room. About Ross: https://ashtangayogaross.com/about-ross Join us and experience firsthand Ross's decades of deep knowledge and inspiring presence! The cost of participation in the workshop is 30 EUR. You can register for the event at our reception by paying the participation fee.
description2English:
In this 1.5-hour workshop, you will learn to use your body as a conduit for giving and receiving vibrations through chanting various traditional South Indian mantras, slokas, stotrams, and sutras. You will learn mechanics of voice control and refine diaphragmatic breathing and Sanskrit pronunciations. Victoria McLellan is a classically trained singer with a deep love for chanting.
Join us and experience firsthand Victoria's decades of deep knowledge and inspiring presence!
The cost of participation in the workshop is 30 EUR. You can register for the event at our reception by paying the participation fee
description1English: Registration is required to participate in the Mysore programme. Read more about the Mysore programme application. If you live abroad and are only in Budapest for a short time and would like to come and practice, please send us a¬†message.
